name: Sales Forecast By Customer
query:
SELECT  sfi.`item` as 'Item Code::150', sfi.`item_name` as 'Item Name::200',  
sfi.`qty_q11` as 'JAN | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q11` as 'JAN | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q11` as 'JAN | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q11` as 'JAN | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q11` as 'JAN | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q11` as 'JAN | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q12` as 'FEB | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q12` as 'FEB | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q12` as 'FEB | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q12` as 'FEB | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q12` as 'FEB | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q12` as 'FEB | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q13` as 'MAR | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q13` as 'MAR | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q13` as 'MAR | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q13` as 'MAR | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q13` as 'MAR | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q13` as 'MAR | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q24` as 'APR | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q24` as 'APR | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q24` as 'APR | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q24` as 'APR | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q24` as 'APR | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q24` as 'APR | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q25` as 'MAY | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q25` as 'MAY | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q25` as 'MAY | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q25` as 'MAY | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q25` as 'MAY | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q25` as 'MAY | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q26` as 'JUN | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q26` as 'JUN | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q26` as 'JUN | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q26` as 'JUN | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q26` as 'JUN | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q26` as 'JUN | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q37` as 'JUL | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q37` as 'JUL | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q37` as 'JUL | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q37` as 'JUL | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q37` as 'JUL | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q37` as 'JUL | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q38` as 'AUG | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q38` as 'AUG | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q38` as 'AUG | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q38` as 'AUG | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q38` as 'AUG | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q38` as 'AUG | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q39` as 'SEP | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q39` as 'SEP | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q39` as 'SEP | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q39` as 'SEP | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q39` as 'SEP | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q39` as 'SEP | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q410` as 'OCT | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q410` as 'OCT | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q410` as 'OCT | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q410` as 'OCT | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q410` as 'OCT | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q410` as 'OCT | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q411` as 'NOV | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q411` as 'NOV | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q411` as 'NOV | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q411` as 'NOV | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q411` as 'NOV | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q411` as 'NOV | LY Forecast::120',  
sfi.`qty_q412` as 'DEC | Qty::100',  
sfi.`final_price_q412` as 'DEC | Final Price::120',  
sfi.`last_price_last_rate_q412` as 'DEC | PL Price::120',  
sfi.`last_sales_rate_q412` as 'DEC | LS Price::120',  
sfi.`last_year_actual_qty_q412` as 'DEC | LY Actual::120',  
sfi.`last_year_forecast_qty_q412` as 'DEC | LY Forecast::120'
From `tabSales Forecast Item` sfi
left join `tabSales Forecast` sf on sf.name=sfi.parent
where sf.docstatus<>2 and sf.company=%(company)s and sf.business_unit=%(business_unit)s and sf.year=%(year)s and sf.sales_person=%(sales_person)s 
and sf.customer=%(customer)s
